column2: "The Photoners were not evil. Looking at their actions, they should be called common occurrences in evolution."
"If the Photoners weren't around, the Darkers most likely wouldn't be either. But then, the ARKS wouldn't exist either."
"Yes, the Photoners were greedy, brimming with curiosity, moderately lazy, arrogant... righteous people."
"No longer being an observer and teaching them knowledge of Photons... What I did... was wrong."
"...but, I was lonely."
"It's a conclusion I find hard to understand."
"That can't be. Xion, you should understand."
"I... I was lonely. Scared, and in pain. I wished to be saved by someone."
"That's when <%me> came, and saved me."
"I've forgotten absolutely everything. But <%me>'s name, and that joy I felt at that moment, I remember."
"Xion, you're the same. When you met the Photoners, you were delighted. Being alone, must have been so lonely..."
"Yes. Xion, you must have been lonely."
"...You... it can't be... Are you... my relative... or my memories...?"
"No, I can feel them. Your emotions, I can feel them."
"You were lonely, so you called out. There's nothing wrong with that."
"What went wrong happened afterwards. Xion, you also think that."
"That's why, in order to fix it, you let <%me> and I meet you, right?"
"...Ah, that's what it was. That emotion I had at the very beginning. That was... loneliness."
"...Xion!"
"<%me>! Hurry, we need to get further in!"
